description: Police officers prevented a stabbing attack at a checkpoint outside Jerusalem on Sunday, an Israel Police spokesperson said.
title: Palestinian Terrorist Shot After Rushing Police With Knife Outside Jerusalem
title_page: Palestinian Terrorist Shot After Rushing Police With Knife Outside Jerusalem
text:
The Times of Israel reports: Police officers prevented a stabbing attack at a checkpoint outside Jerusalem on Sunday, an Israel Police spokesperson said.
A man ran toward a group of police at the Mazmoriya checkpoint near Jerusalemâ€™s Har Homa neighborhood with a knife, police said.
Another officer, watching the area through a security camera, saw the man charging with the knife and warned the officers, police said in a statement.
Police then shot and subdued the victim before any Israeli security personnel could be injured, the statement said. Unconfirmed reports said he was killed.
Read more at the Times of Israel
